thread.section_title: Trustpilot UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of uk.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Mrs J Mateer
thread.title_full: Trustpilot UK reviewed by Mrs J Mateer

author: Mrs J Mateer
title: Mrs J Mateer
text:
I'm delighted that there's somewhere we can go to express our experiences of using different services.
I recently had a very bad experience with a company and felt it was important that others should know about the poor level of service that I received in order to allow them to make an informed choice of who to use themselves. Trust Pilot gives us that platform, to voice our opinions, good, bad, or otherwise. A really worthwhile service, thanks!
